attributes.action: Cap on profit margins for banks and supermarkets.
attributes.additional_details:
All major banks and supermarkets should have their profit margin capped. In the current economic climate shouldn't profits be given back to the customer, in the form of price cuts.
How can the goverment allow Tesco's, Sainsbury's to charge so much for staple food items knowing people are struggling to feed their children the right food.
